name: Concealed Box
description:
You wake up everyday inside of a room. You have no idea how you got there but every night things change. Can you escape... 

or at least survive?

This game is now out, it is my first proper game Ive made, please give all the feedback you possibly want to give, harsh or not, its all positive to me.

I am aware that the ESC key does not work on the end screen, The audio is a bit weird and doesn't sound too great and screen sizes are a little broken, they will be worked on in future projects.
